title: メールの送信が突然できなくなった。
content: 10年以上使ってきたBIGLOBEメールの送信が、今月10日頃からできなくなりました。受信は出来ます。BIGLOBEから10月14日に送信機能停止のお知らせのメールがあり、15日にパスワードを変更して解除申請したら、送信機能停止解除のお知らせメールが来ました。しかし、その後も送信ができず1週間たちました。昨日、BIGLOBEからハガキにて、“送信機能停止のお知らせ”がきたので、解除手続きをしようとしたら、“メール送信機能停止になっていません”と画面になりました。BIGLOBEに問い合わせると、調べてみたら「解除になっています」との返事で、どうすればよいか困っています。サンダーバードのネット画面で、ESRチャンネルからReleaseに切り替えを勧めていますが、関係ありますか？ESRとReleaseの知識がないので良く分かりません。 現在は、最新のVersion144です。 ネット上で、BIGLOBEはサンダーバードを使っている者のトラブル解決には関与しないとの書き込みを見ました。 解決方法が有りましたら、お教えください。
creator: ka3871ok

title: I've created new address book in thunderbird but could not save my email
content: My email contacts are not being saved in Thunderbird’s address book. Some settings might not be working properly. That’s why I created a new address book and imported my previous contacts, but Thunderbird still isn’t saving new ones. Earlier, when I clicked on a contact, it was automatically saved to the address book, but now it’s not working. Please advise me on how to fix this issue.
creator: yeasinn

title: Forwarding an e-mail (in relation to Conversations)
content:
In Gmail if I forward an earlier e-mail of myself, then the who-bar contains the same people I wrote and the e-mail has the same content. That is nice, because that is how I can easily make a new version of my e-mail every week. In Thunderbird it is not so good: the who-bar does not contain the same people, but at least I can copy paste them from the e-mail.

The real problem with this method is: In Thunderbird the conversations then look like this: Guitar lesson: Practise for 1 oktober 

   -> Guitar lesson: Practise for 15 oktober          -> Guitar lesson: Practise for 22 oktober

Can't the "conversations" not just look at the subject instead of if I pressed the forward button?

Thank you!
creator: Linuxrules

title: email
content: For some inexplicable, and undivulged reason, I was denied access to Thunderbird email. Being in Australia, I went to Telstra, my network provider. Their email performance is worth as much as 2 nobs of goat shit. I was more than content with Thunderbird's email deliverance for 6-7 years. Telstras' venture, and alternative, into email, is much less than satisfactory. Fine, I thought,Thunderbird wants money: of which, I'm willing to pay. Instead, upon your website, trying to reconnect, is nothing less than a deluge of total and complete, unmistakably, bullshit. I'm 82, and to think this new age of cyber horseshit, is reminiscence of actual horse shit on the road, when I had to shovel, as a young lad.

title: Ztráta všech minimálně 10 let posbíraných emailů s fakturami, účty a ostatními doklady při rekonstrukci domu.
content:
Tento program Mozilla Thunderbird používám, co pamatuji, nějakých 10 - 15 let a to v Popu i v Imapu. Vždycky všechno fungovalo a to i když moje PC 2x v roce přeinstalovávám a Mozillu programem "Mozilla BackUp" a teď i funkcí Export a import vždy bez problému obnovím všechny uložené emaily a to jak Pop, tak i Imap soubory.Zajímavé je, že po poslední aktualizaci najednou nemůžu najít jediný uložený archivovaný Email. Zabývám se tím už třetí den a nalezl jsem jen 10 let starou zálohu s Českou Televizí a pár nedůležitých věcí. Všechny uložené bankovní výpisy jsou pryč, objednávky a faktury také. Před přeinstalací si celý Profil Thunderbirdu ukládám na zálohovací HDD, ale i tohle bylo jak vidím k ničemu. Vymysleli jste dobrou věc, byl jsem opravdu s tímto programem až donedávna maximálně spokojený, ale jak můžete vydat něco, co nemáte ověřeno, že bude 100% fungovat? Nebo je vám to úplně jedno? Proč tenhle výborný program nemá už v základu po instalaci možnost globální jednotné archivace pro všechny emailové účty, nebo jiný způsob, jak zabránit tomu, aby člověk ztratil nainstalováním nové verze Thunderbirdu všechny nasbírané emaily? Nejsem programátor, jen se počítači zabývám, protože mne to baví, ale dovedu si představit, že pro vaše ajťáky by to byla otázka půl hodiny práce a všichni by byli spokojeni. Takhle ale musím přemýšlet a pátrat, kde a jak budu své důležité emaily ukládat. Je to škoda, mohl jsem vás i finančně podpořit, což jsem už v minulosti několikrát udělal, ale tohle je šlompácký přístup k celé věci a ztratíte spoustu přispěvatelů.

S přáním hezkého zbytku dne a přáním, ať se vám to už v hlavě zapálí a problém vyřešíte

s úctou Jiří Dvořáček
creator: jiri.dvoracek.eu

content:
Goedemiddag,

Zodra ik een reply doe op een email dan veranderd de originele lay-out van die email. Ik heb al gezocht in de instellingen maar helaas nog niet de oplossing gevonden. Ik hoop dat de bijlagen duidelijkheid geven over het probleem. De afbeelding 'originele email toont de email zoals deze binnen is gekomen. De afbeelding 'reply email' toont de email zodra ik erop reageer. Het rood omlijnde is verplaatsbaar waardoor ook de tekst en dus hele opmaak veranderd.

Om privacy redenen heb ik e.e.a. zwart gemaakt.

Alvast bedankt

title: I am not able to send nor receive emails
content:
Please help me! I have expanded on the information which I sent few days ago.

1. Problem which needs to be solved: Starting on Saturday (Oct 18th) morning I have not been able to send or receive emails on Thunderbird. (I turn down my entire network for the night. On Friday evening, before I turned it down, I was still using Thunderbird without any problems. On Saturday morning, after turning the network up, Thunderbird did not work.)

I have two computers: a laptop and a desktop. On both of them I use Thunderbird for most of my emails. They have Windows 10 operating system. Thunderbird stopped working on both computers and at the same time.

2. MS Outlook still works On the desktop I also have MS Outlook. I am able to send and receive emails on the desktop on MS Outlook. There was no break in this software package working.

3. What happened in my email correspondence prior to this problem For about one week prior to Thunderbird’s stopping to work I received numerous emails – which appeared to be sent from my email address xxx@rushmore.com. These emails were pretending to be sent from various companies, including some warnings about my email which needs to be reconfigured or something like this. I deleted all these emails immediately without clicking on any links they would send. Unfortunately, my email provider (BluePeak company) did not catch these emails; they should had been sent to the SPAM folder on their server.

I suspect that maybe some of these emails, or one of these emails, created this problem. A virus?

I have done a full virus scan and it found no problem.

4. Error messages on the desktop when I try to send a test email:

See attachment number 1 for a screenshot.

When I click on [Cancel] I get this message:

See attachment number 2 for a screenshot.

Sometimes instead of these two error messages, I receive a completely different message: see attachment number 3.

5. Error messages on the laptop when I try to send a test email:

On my laptop the error messages are the same, except the number in the [Location] section is different. 587 on the laptop, 465 on the desktop.

6. My current SMTP server settings: Server name: mail.rushmore.com Port: 465 (Default: 465) Connection security: SSL/TLS Authentication method: Normal password User Name: halina@rushmore.com

Could one of you help me, please? I am completely “frozen” with being able to work on some of my projects; one important is organizing a big event and all my communication (high number of emails by now) are on Thunderbird.

Thank you!

Halina H.

title: One message in Inbox is unmovable and unkillable
content:
This is a weird one.

My Inbox folder has an email that cannot be deleted or moved.

If it matters, it's a security alert email from Google. The inbox says it's 16.6kb in size, but if I try to look at it, it's corrupt. I've tried moving it with drag and drop, the "Move to" popup, and the Archive function.

Nothing happens. It's an immovable object. All other messages in the Inbox can be processed normally, it's just this one message.

I've moved all other messages into another folder, closed Thunderbird, deleted Inbox, Inbox.msg, Trash, and Trash.msg, and restarted Thunderbird. Inbox and Trash are both created, with this message back in Inbox again.

Can anyone say where this message is being stored, and/or how I can get rid of it? It looks like there's no actual message, just a pointer to it. It's not doing any damage that I can see, but it's annoying.

content: Salve, chiedo un chiarimento su un problema che sto avendo quando effettuo l’esportazione della rubrica. title: Brother MFC-J6940DW Attach to Email using Thunderbird no longer working
content: We have been using the Brother MFC-J6940DW iPrint&Scan Attach to email successfully with Thunderbird. It creates a new email and attaches the scanned item to it. Recently it stopped working. Nothing happens and there is no error message. We have run all Windows updates. We have uninstalled and reinstalled the Brother drivers, uninstalled and reinstalled Thunderbird, downgraded Thunderbird to v 143 and 140 from current 144 version. We have confirmed Thunderbird is default mail app and verified in registry that Mozilla Thunderbird is default in HKEY_CURRENT_USER|Software\Clients\mail > (Default) value = Mozilla Thunderbird and HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINEISOFTWARE\Clients\Mail > (Default) Value = Mozilla Thunderbird. We have made sure the Firewall talks nice to the Brother Utilities and the ports are ok for Public and Private. Brother tech support says as long as we can do a normal scan that it must be Thunderbird or Windows. Does anyone have any thoughts or other troubleshooting ideas? Thanks in advance. -- Sue
